channel.title: Need help with a few things SoulSprit source
channel.description:
Hello guys i need help with a few things on the new source SoulSprit 1. I need to change the welcome message 2. I need to edit the shops 3.How do i know or find out my powers? and all that stuff 4. compiler doesn't work hers the code please give me the fixed one.
@echo off :build cls javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build
If any one can help me or a good coder can help please leave a reaply thanks.

item.title: Need help with a few things SoulSprit source
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

TRY this.

@echo off
title Compiler
echo Compiling...
javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar 
-d bin src\server\event\*.java 
src\server\model\items\*.java 
src\server\model\minigames\*.java 
src\server\model\npcs\*.java 
src\server\model\objects\*.java 
src\server\model\players\*.java 
src\server\model\players\skills\*.java 
src\server\model\players\packets\*.java 
src\server\model\shops\*.java 
src\server\net\*.java 
src\server\task\*.java 
src\server\util\*.java 
src\server\world\*.java 
src\server\util\log\*.java 
src\server\*.java 
src\server\world\map\*.java
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things SoulSprit source

item.title: Need help with a few things SoulSprit source
item.dc:creator: @unleashed_pvp unleashed pvp
item.description:
@unleashed_pvp wrote:

Hello guys i need help with a few things on the new source SoulSprit

  1. I need to change the welcome message
  2. I need to edit the shops
    3.How do i know or find out my powers? and all that stuff
  3. compiler doesn’t work hers the code please give me the fixed one.
@echo off :build cls javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build

If any one can help me or a good coder can help please leave a reaply thanks.
